seo.title: Samotna podróż do Positano: wskazówki
seo.description: Bezpieczeństwo, pomysły na integrację, hostel vs pokój prywatny i plany na dni w pojedynkę.

intro: Positano is a welcoming solo destination. Stay social at the hostel, plan day trips with buffers, and lean on ferries when the sun’s high.

sections.title: Safety & confidence
list: Use lit routes at night; avoid rushing on stairs.

sections.title: Day plans that work solo
list: Ferry to Amalfi + stroll to Atrani; bus up to Ravello gardens.

tips: Check the reception chalkboard around 6:00 PM for sign-up sheets; it’s the quickest way to find dinner or boat buddies for the next day.

a: If you finish late, the orange Positano Taxi booth by Piazza dei Mulini can arrange a short ride uphill.

faqs.q: How do I meet other travelers when I’m solo?
a: Join the hostel’s sunset terrace meetups or sign up for boat tours that cap group sizes at 10–12 guests.
